thread.title: The New Wonder Woman Trailer Has Landed, and It’s Got Loads of Themyscira!
thread.title_full: The New Wonder Woman Trailer Has Landed, and It’s Got Loads of Themyscira!

author: Marykate Jasper
title: The New Wonder Woman Trailer Has Landed, and It’s Got Loads of Themyscira!
text:
We were promised a new Wonder Woman trailer today, and Warner Brothers and DC have delivered, via star Gal Gadot’s Twitter account.
✨Welcome to Themyscria. I am proud to present the NEW trailer for #WonderWoman ! ✨ pic.twitter.com/7q7SQ80ut1 
— Gal Gadot (@GalGadot) March 12, 2017 

With the tagline, “Witness the future of justice,” the trailer gives us loads of footage on the gorgeous island of Themyscira, and our first look at some of Steve and Diana’s interactions. Diana also encounters London for the first time, concluding, “It’s hideous.”
Most importantly, we get to hear her declare, “I am Diana of Themyscira, daughter of Hippolyta” and battle her enemy “in the name of all that is good.”
What’d you think?
(Via Twitter; image via screengrab)
